item.title: SeaX Messaging
item.description: Overview # The Bulk Messaging Platform puts all the tools you need for SMS and MMS marketing together in one convenient platform. On the Bulk Messaging Platform, you can: Send Send bulk SMS and MMS messages Send now or schedule messages up to 7 days in advance Automatically filter ‘Do Not Contact’ customers out of send lists View delivery reports on bulk messaging waves Send messages from multiple phone numbers Receive
